name: ChikungunyaVirusDiseaseTestsForChikungunyaVirusAntibodyQualitative
title: Chikungunya Virus Disease (Tests for Chikungunya Virus Antibody [Qualitative])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Chikungunya antibody (qualitative results).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Chikungunya),(Exclusion Criteria: - Panel tests, interpretation tests
- All other Arboviral conditions)
